hero.title: Who Unfollowed You
hero.subtitle: Discover who doesn't follow you back, who to unfollow, and find your real Instagram friends. 100% safe, private, and free. Your data never leaves your browser.

demo.title: See It In Action
demo.description: Watch our tool analyze Instagram relationships in real-time and discover what insights you can get.
demo.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

upload.title: Upload Your Instagram Data
upload.subtitle: Select the ZIP file you downloaded from Instagram's data export feature.

errors.invalidFile: Please select a valid ZIP file

security.title: 100% Safe & Private
security.description: Zero account risk. No login required. Uses only Meta's official data export. Your data never leaves your browser.

speed.title: Instant Results
speed.description: Discover who unfollowed you in seconds. No waiting, no complicated process.

analysis.title: Everything You Need
analysis.description: Find who doesn't follow back, mutual followers, your real fans, and all your Instagram relationships.

comparison.title: Safe vs Risky
comparison.subtitle: Why use our tool instead of third-party apps?

q1.question: Is it really safe?
q1.answer: Yes! We only use Meta's official data export. No login, no password, no access to your account.

q2.question: How long does it take?
q2.answer: The Instagram export takes less than a minute. Once you upload it here, analysis is instant.

q3.question: Do you store my data?
q3.answer: Never. Everything happens in your browser. We don't have servers to store your data.

q4.question: Is it really free?
q4.answer: Yes, completely free forever. No premium version, no hidden fees.

howTo.title: How to Download Your Instagram Data

step2.title: Request Your Data
step2.description: Select your Instagram account ‚Üí Choose "Download to device"

step3.title: Select What You Need
step3.description: Uncheck all ‚Üí Check only Followers and Following ‚Üí Save

step4.title: Choose Settings
step4.description: Period: "All time" ‚Üí Format: Select the recommended option ‚Üí Start download

howTo.tip: ‚ö° Quick tip: With only followers data selected, your download will be ready in less than a minute! You'll receive an email with the link immediately.

theyFollow.title: Your Followers

descriptions.youFollow: People you follow but they don't follow you back
descriptions.theyFollow: People who follow you but you don't follow them back

descriptions.pending: Follow requests you've sent that are still pending
descriptions.recentRequests: Recent follow requests received from other users

footer.description:
This project is open source and respects Meta's Terms of Service.
Your data is processed locally and never leaves your browser.
